author: Phil
content:
This says he has an air taxi with 8-motors.

Kitty Hawk, Larry Page’s air taxi outfit, on Thursday showed off its latest concept—an eight-motor
https://www.wired.com/story/kitty-hawk-heaviside-larry-page-flying-car/

author: Willy
content: Take out the batteries. Install a model turbine for RC aircraft with an appropriate sized genset and it could have alot further range.

author: Willy
content: Maybe if it had autonomous computer to take out the human factor. Yes, to turn over to the masses so they could zip around NY city would be NUTS!

author: DAVID RYE
content:
Frpm a Pilot friend:
No, sorry but NO!. This way lies madness, crashes, chaos in the air, nuisance, harassment, stupidity…..I could go on, but NO!
